name: Menu: The Game
description:
GOAL:

Drag and Resize Blocks to Create Level

Get Player to Exit Icon, Triggering Win

IMPORTANT NOTES:

Push Play Button to Activate Player Controls

Push Play Button (Again) to Deactivate Player Controls

When Player Wins, Confetti Spawns, Game Pauses


CONTROLS:

Player: 

Jump
RightLeftDrag & DropWDA(Only when paused)
*aka when play button is solid black*Up ArrowRight ArrowLeft ArrowLeft Click to DragSpaceScroll Wheel (While Dragging) for Sizing

Blocks:

Drag & DropSizingMake DeadlyLeft Click(While Dragging) ScrollRight Click

Menu Interactables:

Play ButtonSettings ButtonSound AdjustColor ChangeRight Click to Start
Right Click Again=Pause   
Right Click to Open SettingsLeft Click & DragAny ClickLeft Click to DragLeft Click to Drag
